dc_description_s: Shapefile data which can be analyzed and organized spatially with GIS software. Includes data covering Europe, as well as large parts of northern Africa and the Middle East. by Christos Nüssli, shapefiles by Marc-Antoine Nüssli. Title from disc label. Euratlas Georeferenced Vector Data is composed of 21 maps, one for each century from year 1 to year 2000. These maps depict the detailed political situation of Europe at the last year of each century. Each map is composed of physical features layers and political features layers. Data file provides description of data layers, the spatial reference system, and Styled Layer Descriptor (SLD) files. System requirements: DVD-Rom drive, Adobe Acrobat Reader, GIS software.
